channel.title: Error with EVERY client i download!
channel.description:

time: Thu Sep 02 15:19:29 2010 elapsed time: 80 seconds
^^ I get that error after a min of running any downloaded client! Ive tried: Silab Moparscape My own (Came with my source) and alot more! Please help me!! =(

item.title: Error with EVERY client i download!
item.dc:creator: @xEvo Exion
item.description:
@xEvo wrote:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Read full topic
item.source: Error with EVERY client i download!

item.title: Error with EVERY client i download!
item.dc:creator: @wintzer wintzer
item.description:
